contentrichtext.text: '''LDC''' may refer to: * [[Least Developed Countries]] or [[Developing country|Less developed country]] * [[Lyon Dubai City]] * [[Linley's Dungeon Crawl]], a Roguelike role-playing game * Long Distance Code of [[Reed-Solomon code]] * [[Leonardo DiCaprio]] * [[Load Duration Curve]] * [[Linguistic Data Consortium]] * Lower Division Clerk, another division in [[clerk (position)|Clerk]] Position * Louisiana Department of Corrections (now [[Louisiana Department of Public Safety & Corrections]]) * [[LDC (société)]], member of the [[CAC Mid 100]] * [[LLVM D Compiler]], [[D (programming language)]] compiler using [[LLVM]] backend * [[Large diaphragm condenser]] (Audio terminology) [[Microphone]] * [[Local distribution company]] {{disambig}}
